headline: NVIDIA Deepens Role In Global AI Infrastructure With Sovereign And Enterprise Builds
summary: NVIDIA (NasdaqGS:NVDA) is expanding global AI partnerships and product launches tied to sovereign and enterprise-grade AI infrastructure. New deployments include government backed AI factories in India with L&T, Yotta, and Netweb, plus high performance desktop AI supercomputers. Australia’s first sovereign AI cloud is rolling out with Cisco, supported by recent NVIDIA architectures. Meta plans to deploy millions of NVIDIA chips as part of its large scale AI build out. Red Hat and NVIDIA...
